# Senti-news

A few different tools for sentiment analysis of news titles.

## Models
### Vader
Valence ...
### TextBlob
### LSTM trained on IMDB
### More to come

## Scraping
### NYT/CNN/FOX scraper
Uses each of their API's to get news titles
### News-API 
Wide-spanning search, though only within last 30 days.

## Database
For storing files
